column2: .cran_packages <- c("data.table", "igraph", "ggplot2", "RColorBrewer", "vegetarian", "vegan", "knitr", "devtools");.inst <- .cran_packages %in% installed.packages();if(any(!.inst)) {install.packages(.cran_packages[!.inst])};.bioc_packages <- c("DESeq2","phyloseq"); if(any(!.inst)){source("http://bioconductor.org/biocLite.R");biocLite(.bioc_packages[!.inst], ask = F)}; sapply(c(.cran_packages, .bioc_packages), require, character.only = TRUE);
